name: Mushroom Minder
description:
Mushroom Minder is a little casual relaxed farming, gathering and cooking simulation game.

It is playable in the browser or you can download the game for mac or windows and play on your pc. The downloaded game can be stretched to fullscreen by pressing F4. While playing in the browser there is a button in the bottom right to fullscreen the game, however it will stay at a small size.

This game is suitable for all ages.

Credits:

Tileset resources and animals by Avery

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/avys-mv-stuff.53317/

Animals and extra vines by whtdragon

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/whtdragons-animals-and-running-...

Mushrooms by Ayene

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/ayenes-tiles.27710/

Window skin (slightly edited) by hiddenone

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/hiddenones-mv-resource-warehouse.47255/

Game created in RPG Maker MZ, developer also owns rights to assets from RPG Maker MV/VX Ace/XP.
